sentences.sContent: My message is "If you try to smuggle drugs you are stupid."
sentences.sCn: 我的讯息是，“你若企图走私毒品，那是犯傻。”

remMethod.val: 不断进行反走私(smuggle)的斗争(struggle)

words.tran: 走私者；走私犯；[法] 走私船

trans.tranCn: 走私， 非法私运； 偷运， 偷带
trans.tranOther: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another
